amendatorysection.catchline: Bond issuance; not obligation of state; statement required.
amendatorysection.para: No bonds issued by the corporation under sections 2-4201 to 2-4246 shall constitute a debt, liability, or general obligation of this state, or a pledge of the faith and credit of this state, but shall be payable solely as provided by section 2-4223. Each bond issued under sections 2-4201 to 2-4246 shall contain on the face thereof a statement that neither the faith and credit nor the taxing power of this state is pledged to the payment of the principal of or the interest on such bond.
